Result.Title: Theorizing and Researching Intersectionality: A Challenge for Feminist Geography

Result.Title: Boundary Crossings: Transitions from Childhood to Adulthood

Result.Title: Exploring children and young people’s narratives of identity

Result.Abstract: In this paper, we extend recent discussions on the geographies of encounter to examine how students and staff narrate their experiences of cross-cultural contact on a British university campus. Result.Title: Consuming campus: geographies of encounter at a British university

Result.Title: Scoria Cone Construction Mechanism, Lathrop Wells Volcano, Southern Nevada

Result.Title: University of New Mexico-Los Alamos National Laboratory Program in Volcanology
